summary: A test suite that validates the behavior of a custom partitioning component, providing helper utilities for function creation, forward propagation, sharding inference, lowering, partition execution, and user sharding propagation, while conditionally skipping tests on unsupported platforms.
business_intent: Guarantee that custom partitioning logic works correctly across different scenarios, ensuring proper sharding handling and integration within the larger system, and prevent test failures on environments lacking required support.
